description: A cyberpunk system with a mix of high-tech and magic.

feats.name: Cyber-Arm Overcharge
feats.description: Overcharge your cybernetic arm for a massive melee attack.
feats.effect: +5 damage with melee cyber-weapon for 1 turn

feats.name: Invisibility Cloak
feats.description: Activate your light-bending cloak to become invisible.

customRules.title: Netrunning
customRules.description: To jack into the net, a character makes a Hacking (Tech) check. The difficulty depends on the target system's security level. Failure can result in system alerts or neural feedback damage.

customRules.title: Mana Burn
customRules.description: When casting a spell, a character can choose to 'burn' mana to increase its power. For each point of Mana Burn, the spell's effect is amplified, but the caster takes 1d4 psychic damage.
